Show all posts March 31, 2016 China proposes $50+ trillion Global UHV grid connecting all power generation including massive wind farm at the North Pole by 2050 china, economic impact, energy, future, solar, wind, world Facebook Twitter linkedin google Reddit China is proposing a $50+ trillion global energy grid. Global Energy Interconnection (GEI), a vision of a world power grid, was outlined by the State Grid Corporation of C
